thread.title: The 7 Best Gold-Frame Sunglasses for Summer - WSJ.com

author: Photography Hanna Tveite For Wsj. Magazine
title: The 7 Best Gold-Frame Sunglasses for Summer - WSJ.com
text: The 7 Best Gold-Frame Sunglasses for Summer Modern sunglasses with tinted lenses are a strong match for bright colors and sharp tailoring Photography by Hanna Tveite for WSJ. Magazine, Fashion Editor: Alexander Fisher Scroll SHADY LOOKS Oliver Peoples sunglasses, $380, oliverpeoples​.com , Lanvin coat, $3,995, lanvin​​.com , Balenciaga earrings, $395 (sold as a pair), Balenciaga, 148 Mercer Street, New York Hanna Tveite for WSJ. Magazine, Fashion Editor: Alexander Fisher Céline sunglasses, $860, Céline, 870 Madison Avenue, New York, Michael Kors Collection trench, $3,995, select Michael Kors stores, Balenciaga earrings, $395 (sold as a pair), Balenciaga, 148 Mercer Street, New York Hanna Tveite for WSJ. Magazine, Fashion Editor: Alexander Fisher Alexander McQueen sunglasses, $470, alexandermcqueen​.com , Hermès top, $1,500, and jacket, $4,100, Hermès stores nationwide, Céline earrings, $1,050, barneys​.com Hanna Tveite for WSJ. Magazine, Fashion Editor: Alexander Fisher Chloé sunglasses, $400, and jacket, $2,595, Chloé boutiques, Versace sweater, $725, select Versace stores, Céline earrings, $1,050 (sold as a pair), barneys​.com Hanna Tveite for WSJ. Magazine, Fashion Editor: Alexander Fisher STRIKING GOLD Louis Vuitton sunglasses, price upon request, select Louis Vuitton stores, Akris dress, $2,390, saksfifthavenue​.com , Charlotte Chesnais cuff, $1,690, and necklace, $1,870, Dover Street Market, 160 Lexington Avenue, New York Hanna Tveite for WSJ. Magazine, Fashion Editor: Alexander Fisher Givenchy sunglasses, $395, solsticesunglasses​.com , Bottega Veneta coat, $7,750, Bottega Veneta, 800-845-6790, The Row shirt, $850, The Row, 17 East 71st Street, New York, Marni earrings, $440, Marni boutiques Hanna Tveite for WSJ. Magazine, Fashion Editor: Alexander Fisher Ahlem Eyewear sunglasses, $470, ahlemeyewear.com , Joseph shirt, $745, joseph-fashion.com , Jacquemus earring, $300 (sold as a pair), jacquemus.com Hanna Tveite for WSJ. Magazine, Fashion Editor: Alexander Fisher, Model, Sara Blomqvist at DNA Model Management; hair, Tsuki Takayoshi; makeup, Virginia Young; manicure, Yuko Tsuchihashi Advertisement
